Fāʼidah wa-mimmā naqalahu al-Shaykh Zarrūq al-Maghribī al-Mālikī ʻalá Sharh asmāʼ al-ḥusná manāfiʻ al-asmāʼ al-Idrisīyah al-Suhrawardīyah (ff. 71r-78r) -- 6. Fāʼidah jalīlah fī faḍāʼil ṣawm Ramaḍān (ff. 78r-96r).
Written in one column, 15 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
Bound ; marbled boards; brown leather spine and corners.

Ownership statement signed Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Q.ṭ.rī, Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1119 AH [February 1708 AD]. Another note says that the book was found in the tarikah of al-Shaykh Muḥammad ʻAllām, 1256 AH [1840 or 1 AD].
MS Arab SM4295-4300. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
